metadata.title: CVE-2024-6610 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Form validation popups could capture escape key presses. Therefore,spamming form validation messages could be used to prevent users fromexiting full-screen mode. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
